channel.title: Ports won't open no matter what
channel.description: Well, I've had two servers before. Although they weren't that successful they worked at least. Basically, I can't get my ports to open. I've done everything right, no doubt about it.. It just seems like my router doesn't like being portforwarded... any help? thanks

item.title: Ports won't open no matter what
item.dc:creator: @boxes boxes
item.description:
@boxes wrote:

You have team veiwer? I’ll help you pm me your team veiwer stuff or if not still message me I can walk you through the steps

Read full topic

item.title: Ports won't open no matter what

item.description:

What do you mean? the ip used to port-forward with?
The IPv4 address in that case, and yes it’s correct
